msg.msgText: An operation that requires the destination name to be set failed because the destination name is not set.

msgExplanation.p: The destination name must be set before calling getTopicName(), getQueueName(), createBrowser(), createConsumer(), createDurableSubscriber(), send(), or publish(), and before calling createProducer() if specifying a non-null destination.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the destination name is set before calling getTopicName(),getQueueName(), createBrowser(), createConsumer(), createDurableSubscriber(), send(), or publish(), and before calling createProducer() if specifying a non-null destination.
